oop1314.lab04.bank

Class AbstractBankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop1314.lab04.bank.AbstractBankAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBankAccount

    public abstract class AbstractBankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBankAccount
    Abstract class modeling an AccountHolder bank account. To be used as the starting point for implementing a bank account. Concrete classes extending it have to define the implementation for the method isATMFeeToApply() which specify the policy to use for computing ATM fee for whitdraw/deposits withdrawFromATM(int, double) depositFromATM(int, double) from an ATM
    Author:
    Andrea Santi
